thread.title: Bears ‘Not Expected’ To Franchise Tag Alshon Jeffery, Per Report
thread.title_full: Bears ‘Not Expected’ To Franchise Tag Alshon Jeffery, Per Report

author: CBS Philly
title: Bears ‘Not Expected’ To Franchise Tag Alshon Jeffery, Per Report
text:
Bears ‘Not Expected’ To Franchise Tag Alshon Jeffery, Per Report February 27, 2017 8:43 AM By Andrew Porter Filed Under: Eagles Alshon Jeffery #17 of the Chicago Bears and head coach John Fox on October 31, 2016 in Chicago, Illinois. (Photo by Stacy Revere/Getty Images) 
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — Chicago Bears top receiver Alshon Jeffery is likely to hit the open market on March 7th, when teams can begin negotiations with unrestricted free-agents. 
Related: DeSean Jackson Admits Returning To Philly ‘Would Be Great Ending’ 
According to a report, the Bears are not expected to franchise tag Jeffery. #Bears are not expected to franchise Alshon Jeffery again at > $17M, sources say. A top WR on the market will generate lots of buzz in Indy
